name: Episode 10
headline: Immune Mediated Pulmonary Toxicities
hosts: Hosts:Â Join our hosts Dr. Afreen Shariff and Dr. Tian Zhang as they discuss with guest expert and Oncologist, Dr. Jarushka Naidoo about the complex and challenging diagnosis of Immune mediated Pneumonitis. Dr. Jarushka Naidoo is currently a thoracic oncologist at Beaumont Hospital, Royal College of Surgeons of Ireland and she is also the national lead for lung cancer for Cancer Trials Ireland, and serves as an adjunct professor at Johns Hopkins University. She also serves on the NCCN guidelines committee for the management of immune-related toxicity, and runs an institutional multidisciplinary team for immune toxicity management.
